name: Dam and Bolt Puzzle
description: Finding the wrench, opening the bolt at the dam, and draining the reservoir

entries.notes: Taking the wrench from the Maintenance Room

entries.expectedOutput: The bolt won't turn with your best effort.
entries.notes: First attempt to open the bolt

entries.expectedOutput: The bolt turns and the sluice gates open. Water pours through the dam and downstream.

Dam
You are standing on the top of the Flood Control Dam #3, which was quite likely the last one built. The dam itself is here, and it appears to be in good repair. Water is flowing through the sluice gates.
